Description:
Join Shelley as she talks with President and CEO of the National Retail Federation (NRF), Matt Shay. Listen in as Matt charts his journey from early career to joining the NRF in 2010 which he has since helped transform into Washingtonâ€™s most powerful voice supporting the retail industry. Matt also shares his thoughts on the big challenges and opportunities facing the retail industry at large as well as leadership principles and lessons learned over the years.
